title: Fast approximate Bayesian inference of HIV indicators using PCA adaptive Gauss-Hermite quadrature
summary: This paper presents a spatial evidence synthesis model, Naomi, used to produce district-level HIV epidemic indicators. It jointly models multiple outcomes using household survey data and routinely reported health system data, proposing a new inference method based on an extension of adaptive Gauss-Hermite quadrature.
